code: /* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */import axios from"axios";import{useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useMessage}from"./useMessage";export const useRankingAllUsers=()=>{const{showMessage}=useMessage();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const getRankings=useCallback(()=>{setLoading(true);axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/ranking").then(res=>setUsers(res.data)).catch(()=>{showMessage({title:"ユーザー取得に失敗しました",status:"error"});setError("ユーザーの取得に失敗しました");}).finally(()=>{setLoading(false);});},[]);return{getRankings,loading,users,error};};
